title: Worship Without Comparison
description: Today, do not compare your worship or knowledge to anyone else's. Focus inward only.

en.title: Worship Without Comparison
en.description: Today, do not compare your worship or knowledge to anyone else's. Focus inward only.

fr.title: Adoration sans comparaison
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, ne comparez pas votre adoration ou vos connaissances à celles des autres. Concentrez-vous uniquement vers l'intérieur.

ar.title: العبادة بدون مقارنة
ar.description: اليوم، لا تقارن عبادتك أو علمك بأي شخص آخر. ركز على الداخل فقط.

title: Hidden Deeds – 3 Days
description: Do one good deed each day in complete secrecy. Tell no one. Not even in hint.

en.title: Hidden Deeds – 3 Days
en.description: Do one good deed each day in complete secrecy. Tell no one. Not even in hint.

fr.title: Bonnes actions cachées – 3 jours
fr.description: Faites une bonne action chaque jour en secret complet. Ne le dites à personne. Même pas par allusion.

ar.title: أعمال خفية – 3 أيام
ar.description: افعل عملاً صالحاً كل يوم في سرية تامة. لا تخبر أحداً. حتى لو بتلميح.

title: 7 Days of Sincere Humility
description: For one week, focus on your flaws during worship. Reflect on how far you are from Allah.

en.title: 7 Days of Sincere Humility
en.description: For one week, focus on your flaws during worship. Reflect on how far you are from Allah.

ar.title: 7 أيام من التواضع الصادق
ar.description: لمدة أسبوع، تدرب على التواضع الحقيقي في أمور الدين.

fr.title: 7 jours d'humilité sincère
fr.description: Pendant une semaine, pratiquez l'humilité véritable dans les affaires religieuses.

title: Greet Everyone First
description: Greet people today regardless of status — from cleaner to executive — equally and sincerely.

en.title: Greet Everyone First
en.description: Greet people today regardless of status — from cleaner to executive — equally and sincerely.

fr.title: Saluez tout le monde en premier
fr.description: Saluez les gens aujourd'hui quel que soit leur statut — du nettoyeur au cadre — de manière égale et sincère.

ar.title: سلم على الجميع أولاً
ar.description: سلم على الناس اليوم بغض النظر عن المكانة — من عامل النظافة إلى المدير التنفيذي — بشكل متساوٍ وبصدق.

title: Eat with the 'Lowly'
description: Sit or eat with someone you might subconsciously look down on. Do it with joy and love.

en.title: Eat with the 'Lowly'
en.description: Sit or eat with someone you might subconsciously look down on. Do it with joy and love.

ar.title: كل مع 'المتواضعين'
ar.description: اجلس أو تناول الطعام مع شخص قد تنظر إليه بتعالٍ لاشعوري. افعل ذلك بفرح ومحبة.

fr.title: Mangez avec les 'humbles'
fr.description: Asseyez-vous ou mangez avec quelqu'un que vous pourriez inconsciemment mépriser. Faites-le avec joie et amour.

title: 14-Day Superiority Cleanse
description: Avoid all thoughts or speech that imply you're better than anyone — for two full weeks.

en.title: 14-Day Superiority Cleanse
en.description: Avoid all thoughts or speech that imply you're better than anyone — for two full weeks.

ar.title: تطهير التفوق لمدة 14 يوماً
ar.description: لمدة أسبوعين، تخلص من مشاعر التفوق على الآخرين.

fr.title: Nettoyage de supériorité de 14 jours
fr.description: Pendant deux semaines, éliminez les sentiments de supériorité sur les autres.

title: No Mirror Praise
description: Do not admire yourself in a mirror or selfie today. Say 'Allahumma kama hassanta khalqi…'

en.title: No Mirror Praise
en.description: Do not admire yourself in a mirror or selfie today. Say 'Allahumma kama hassanta khalqi…'

fr.title: Pas d'éloge devant le miroir
fr.description: Ne vous admirez pas dans un miroir ou un selfie aujourd'hui. Dites 'Allahumma kama hassanta khalqi…'

ar.title: لا مدح أمام المرآة
ar.description: لا تُعجب بنفسك في المرآة أو السيلفي اليوم. قل 'اللهم كما حسنت خلقي…'

title: Dress Simply – 3 Days
description: Wear something modest and simple — not for others, but to purify your intent.

en.title: Dress Simply – 3 Days
en.description: Wear something modest and simple — not for others, but to purify your intent.

ar.title: البساطة في الزي - 3 أيام
ar.description: لمدة 3 أيام، اختر الملابس البسيطة وتجنب التفاخر.

fr.title: Simplicité vestimentaire - 3 jours
fr.description: Pendant 3 jours, choisissez des vêtements simples et évitez l'ostentation.

title: 7-Day Vanity Cleanse
description: Avoid all vanity-related actions or thoughts — beauty, clothes, or strength — for 7 days.

en.title: 7-Day Vanity Cleanse
en.description: Avoid all vanity-related actions or thoughts — beauty, clothes, or strength — for 7 days.

ar.title: تطهير الغرور لمدة 7 أيام
ar.description: لمدة أسبوع، تخلص من الغرور والاهتمام المفرط بالمظهر.

fr.title: Nettoyage de vanité de 7 jours
fr.description: Pendant une semaine, éliminez la vanité et l'attention excessive à l'apparence.

title: Accept One Correction
description: Today, if someone corrects you — even if harsh — take it gently. Say thank you.

en.title: Accept One Correction
en.description: Today, if someone corrects you — even if harsh — take it gently. Say thank you.

ar.title: تقبل تصحيح واحد
ar.description: اليوم، تقبل نصيحة أو تصحيح من شخص بصدر رحب.

fr.title: Accepter une correction
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, acceptez un conseil ou une correction de quelqu'un avec ouverture d'esprit.

title: Ask for Feedback – 3 Days
description: Ask someone you trust for sincere advice, and receive it silently. Reflect deeply.

en.title: Ask for Feedback – 3 Days
en.description: Ask someone you trust for sincere advice, and receive it silently. Reflect deeply.

ar.title: اطلب التغذية الراجعة - 3 أيام
ar.description: اطلب نصيحة أو تغذية راجعة من شخص تثق به.

fr.title: Demandez des commentaires - 3 jours
fr.description: Demandez conseil ou feedback à quelqu'un en qui vous avez confiance.

title: 7-Day Openness to Correction
description: Each day, welcome advice. Keep a journal of what you hear without justifying yourself.

en.title: 7-Day Openness to Correction
en.description: Each day, welcome advice. Keep a journal of what you hear without justifying yourself.

ar.title: 7 أيام من الانفتاح على التصحيح
ar.description: لمدة أسبوع، كن منفتحاً على النقد البناء والتصحيح.

fr.title: 7 jours d'ouverture à la correction
fr.description: Pendant une semaine, soyez ouvert à la critique constructive et à la correction.

title: One Sincere Apology
description: Find someone you've wronged — however small — and apologise with sincerity.

en.title: One Sincere Apology
en.description: Find someone you've wronged — however small — and apologise with sincerity.

ar.title: اعتذار صادق واحد
ar.description: اليوم، قدم اعتذاراً صادقاً لشخص أخطأت في حقه.

fr.title: Une excuse sincère
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, présentez des excuses sincères à quelqu'un envers qui vous avez eu tort.

title: 3 Days of Softness
description: If you're confronted, respond without ego. Apologise even when it stings.

en.title: 3 Days of Softness
en.description: If you're confronted, respond without ego. Apologise even when it stings.

ar.title: 3 أيام من الرقة
ar.description: لمدة 3 أيام، تعامل مع الجميع برقة وتواضع.

fr.title: 3 jours de douceur
fr.description: Pendant 3 jours, traitez tout le monde avec douceur et humilité.

title: 7-Day Pride Detox
description: For 7 days, actively look for moments to say: 'I was wrong' or 'I'm sorry.' Let your heart soften.

en.title: 7-Day Pride Detox
en.description: For 7 days, actively look for moments to say: 'I was wrong' or 'I'm sorry.' Let your heart soften.

ar.title: تخلص من الكبر لمدة 7 أيام
ar.description: لمدة أسبوع، تخلص من الكبر والعناد.

fr.title: Détox d'orgueil de 7 jours
fr.description: Pendant une semaine, éliminez l'orgueil et l'entêtement.

title: Do It in Secret
description: Today, do one good deed and actively hide it. No sharing. No reward but Allah.

en.title: Do It in Secret
en.description: Today, do one good deed and actively hide it. No sharing. No reward but Allah.

ar.title: افعلها في السر
ar.description: اليوم، افعل شيئاً جيداً في السر لا يعرفه أحد غير الله.

fr.title: Faites-le en secret
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, faites quelque chose de bien en secret que personne ne connaît sauf Allah.

title: No Praise Check – 3 Days
description: Don't check social media or ask how people responded to your words or efforts.

en.title: No Praise Check – 3 Days
en.description: Don't check social media or ask how people responded to your words or efforts.

ar.title: فحص عدم المدح - 3 أيام
ar.description: لمدة 3 أيام، تجنب طلب المدح أو الثناء.

fr.title: Vérification sans éloge - 3 jours
fr.description: Pendant 3 jours, évitez de chercher des éloges ou des compliments.

title: 14-Day Fame Cleanse
description: For two weeks, detach from the need for recognition. Be silent and unseen, for Allah alone.

en.title: 14-Day Fame Cleanse
en.description: For two weeks, detach from the need for recognition. Be silent and unseen, for Allah alone.

ar.title: تطهير الشهرة لمدة 14 يوماً
ar.description: لمدة أسبوعين، تخلص من حب الشهرة والظهور.

fr.title: Nettoyage de célébrité de 14 jours
fr.description: Pendant deux semaines, éliminez l'amour de la célébrité et de l'apparence.

title: One Gesture of Equality
description: Today, sit, eat, or walk with someone whom others usually overlook.

en.title: One Gesture of Equality
en.description: Today, sit, eat, or walk with someone whom others usually overlook.

ar.title: إيماءة مساواة واحدة
ar.description: اليوم، أظهر إيماءة واحدة تؤكد المساواة مع شخص تعتبره 'أقل منك'.

fr.title: Un geste d'égalité
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, montrez un geste qui affirme l'égalité avec quelqu'un que vous considérez comme 'inférieur'.

title: 3-Day Language Watch
description: Avoid all belittling words — even in tone or implication — for 3 days.

en.title: 3-Day Language Watch
en.description: Avoid all belittling words — even in tone or implication — for 3 days.

ar.title: مراقبة اللغة لمدة 3 أيام
ar.description: لمدة 3 أيام، راقب لغتك وتجنب الكلام المتعالي.

fr.title: Surveillance du langage de 3 jours
fr.description: Pendant 3 jours, surveillez votre langage et évitez les paroles condescendantes.

title: 7-Day Respect Practice
description: Speak to everyone as if they were spiritually higher than you. Let it reshape your manner.

en.title: 7-Day Respect Practice
en.description: Speak to everyone as if they were spiritually higher than you. Let it reshape your manner.

ar.title: 7 أيام من ممارسة الاحترام
ar.description: لمدة أسبوع، تعامل مع الجميع باحترام وتواضع.

fr.title: 7 jours de pratique du respect
fr.description: Pendant une semaine, traitez tout le monde avec respect et humilité.
